item.title: The Perennial- Combating climate change through food
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-JEcipXVFgM ANTHONY MYINT and KAREN LEIBOWITZ are husband-and-wife co-founders of The Perennial, an award-winning San Francisco restaurant and bar dedicated to making food the delicious solution to climate change. Anthony and Karen co-authored the memoir/cookbook Mission Street Food: Recipes and Ideas from an Improbable Restaurant (2011), and they often work together, though Anthony is primarily a restaurateur whose projects include Mission Chinese Food (SF & NYC), Commonwealth (SF), and Mission Cantina (NYC), and Karen is primarily a food writer who has written for Lucky Peach, Food & Wine, and The New York Times, among other publications.
